login: Welcome back! Access your account below. If you're having trouble loggin in,
loginReverify: If you're a new user and did not receive a verification code,
reverify: Still awaiting your email verification? No problem, resend it now.
verify: If the account ID and verification code did not auto-fill, please copy-and-paste from the email to continue. Verification codes are valid for only five days. After that time, you'll need to request a new code.
passwordReset: Enter the email you login with below. If an email doesn't arrive shortly after, it is possible that you have entered the wrong address or that you account is suspended.
